DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety SPD503 subject ADHD co-administered psychostimulants child adolescent age 6-17 year diagnosis ADHD sub-optimal , partial response stimulant .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety SPD503 Combination With Psychostimulants
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject ADHD currently take stable dose psychostimulant least 4 week Aged 617 year suboptimal Partial response stimulant Subjects must < 95th percentile BMI weight > = 55lbs < = 176lbs
